wikipedia_page.main: Tom Lowe (25 July 1859 – 29 August 1934) was an English first-class cricketer active 1894 who played for Nottinghamshire. He was born and died in Kirkby-in-Ashfield.

response: Thomas or Tom Lowe may refer to:
*Tom Lowe (writer) (fl. 1998–2010), writer and filmmaker from Southern California
*Tom Lowe (performer) (born 1978), English-born singer and actor who featured on American Idol
